questions.title: Question 1: Linked List Insert
questions.body: Which sequence correctly inserts a node `n` at the head of a singly linked list?
options: Set n.next = head; set head = n;
Set head = n; set n.next = head;
Allocate node, traverse to tail, append node.
Set head.next = n; set n.prev = head;
questions.explanation: To insert at the head: set the new node's next pointer to the current head, then update head to point to the new node.

questions.title: Question 2: Software engineering steps
questions.body: Arrange the following software engineering steps into the correct order (from first to last).
questions.explanation: Typical high-level phases: Requirements -> Design -> Implementation -> Testing -> Deployment.
